description.narrative: Contribute to the peace process by providing interim cash transfers and services to eligible conflict-affected groups and by increasing transparency and accountability in the delivery of these benefits.

condition.narrative: Ensure that benefit payments are carried out in accordance with provisions in the Benefit Payment Operational Guidelines and thatno action is taken that would prevent or interfere with the payments.
Ensure that key staff in the PMT are not transferred to other positions during Project Implementation except with prior notice tothe Association.
Ensure that responsibilites for high level oversight of the implementation of Project activities are vested in the NPTF SteeringCommittee until formation of the Peace Commission.
Furnish to IDA audited financial statements for the period of 1 fiscal year not later than 6 months after the end of such period.
Furnish to IDA not later than 6 months audit of financial statements covering the period of 1 FY of the recipient.
Furnish to the Association at least 60 days prior to the beginning of each fiscal year a proposed annual work program and budget.
Maintain a financial management system in accordance with provisions of Sec. 4.09 of the General Conditions.
Maintain the Project Management Team with functions and key professionals with skills, qualifications, experience and TORacceptable to the Association.
Prepare and furnish to the Association interin un-audited financial reports covering the fiscal year trimester not later than 45days after the end of each fiscal year trimester.
Prepare project progress reports in accordance with provisions of Sect. 4.08 of the General Conditions.
